attributes.action: Improve training for staff on psych wards
attributes.additional_details: Too many people have traumatic experiences and treatment in psychiatric wards. This needs to change.
attributes.background: Improve psych wards by improving training for staff

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about training for medical professionals working in mental health are a matter for the relevant authorities that oversee these professions, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Improve awareness of mental health conditions and support for sufferers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616860
